entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
